benchmark_details.name: FinDABench
benchmark_details.overview: FinDABench is a comprehensive benchmark designed to evaluate the financial data analysis capabilities of Large Language Models (LLMs) within the context of financial data analysis, organized around three core competencies: Foundational Ability, Reasoning Ability, and Technical Skill.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a measure for in-depth analysis of LLM abilities in financial data analysis and to foster the advancement of LLMs in this field.

data.annotation: Manually checked and annotated with expert guidance to ensure accuracy in financial contexts.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on model predictions compared to gold standard answers.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better performance in understanding and analyzing financial data.
methodology.baseline_results: GPT-4 achieves a score of 32.37% total result in zero-shot settings.
methodology.validation: Examined via a comprehensive assessment of 41 different LLMs.
